item.title: Get Things Done: My Take Away
item.author: xiangaoole@gmail.com (Harold Gao)
item.description: Get Things Done is a self-help book written by David Allen, introduces some basic methods to arrange your daily tasks so that you can live a productive and stressless live. Here are my takeaways.

item.title: My English Learning Story
item.author: xiangaoole@gmail.com (Harold Gao)
item.description:
Part 1

I am 27 years old now. I had my first English course around at the age of 10. At that time English was not a course being taught at elementary school, and it usually was taught starting in middle school. But my mother found a teacher to teach me simple English words on Saturdays. I mainly learned basic vocabulary, such as numbers, months and letters.
